results.title: Winter Storm System Brings Heavy Snow and Rain Across the U.S.
results.abstract: The system has clobbered the Sierra Nevada with snowfall of up to three inches an hour and is expected to affect travel from the Central Plains to the Upper Midwest, forecasters said.

results.title: Dating Scammer Who Swindled Women Sentenced to Five Years in Prison
results.abstract: Over two decades, Patrick Giblin took hundreds of thousands of dollars from scores of women across the United States, federal court records show. A federal judge imposed a 66-month prison sentence.

results.title: Some Prisoners Remain Behind Bars in Louisiana Despite Being Deemed Free
results.abstract: About 200 to 250 inmates are held beyond their legal release dates in any given month, with the average additional time lasting around 44 days in 2019.

media.caption: “It’s a bad, bad feeling,” said Johnny Traweek, who was held in a Louisiana prison past his release date. “Every day, I’m getting up and thinking I’m going to get out.”
